alert.note: Alert for Prince of Wales Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 10 at 11:09PM AKDT until April 11 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SNOW ACROSS PRINCE OF WALES ISLAND... .Convective snow showers associated with a low moving over Prince of Wales Island have resulted in accumulating snow, particularly along western parts of the island. Snow is expected to continue through much of the nighttime period before rates diminish as the low weakens. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Snow accumulations of up to 4 inches. * WHERE...Prince of Wales Island. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Convective snow showers will result in some localized areas seeing more snow accumulation than others.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
